hero.title: Everything you need in one place.
hero.description: Discover the best products from electronics to fashion with unbeatable prices and fast delivery.

ABOUT_US.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT_US.SUBTITLE: Learn more about our mission, vision, and values.
ABOUT_US.PARAGRAPH_1: Shpoza is your trusted online store, offering a wide range of quality products with great prices. We are dedicated to providing excellent customer service and ensuring your satisfaction with every purchase.
ABOUT_US.PARAGRAPH_2: Our mission is to make shopping easy, enjoyable, and accessible to everyone. Join us on this journey and experience the difference!

CONTACT.TITLE: Let's Connect
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: I'm Ahmed Hashim, a Frontend Angular developer. I help individuals and companies build modern, responsive websites that drive success.
CONTACT.FOOTER: Looking forward to hearing from you!

SERVICES.TITLE: Why Shop with Shopza?
SERVICES.SUBTITLE: A full range of services that make shopping and selling easier than ever.

FAST_DELIVERY.TITLE: Fast & Secure Delivery
FAST_DELIVERY.DESCRIPTION: We work with trusted couriers to ensure quick delivery across the country.

SECURE_PAYMENT.TITLE: Secure Online Payment
SECURE_PAYMENT.DESCRIPTION: Multiple encrypted payment options including Visa, Mastercard, and local wallets.

PRODUCTS.TITLE: Wide Product Variety
PRODUCTS.DESCRIPTION: From fashion to electronics, we offer thousands of products in every category.

SUPPORT.TITLE: 24/7 Customer Support
SUPPORT.DESCRIPTION: Our support team is available around the clock to help you anytime.

SELL_EASY.TITLE: Sell with Ease
SELL_EASY.DESCRIPTION: Easy onboarding for sellers with full control through powerful dashboards.
